hackathon-description-text: Hackathons are a great way for Vantiv to cultivate and harness creativity of their teams and build without constraints.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Sr. Leader of Enterprise Boarding and Servicing Products / Vantiv

hackathon-eligibility: Be a Vantiv employee and follow the rules.
hackathon-requirements:
Submit your project through this site and then demo your project in-person to be eligible for prizes.
Submission should apply to one or more of these categories for best chance to win. 
 
Check out

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Vantiv employees will pick their favorite project by reviewing submissions and selecting which idea they like. The team with the most likes wins. For all your hard work, as a team will attend a friendly one-on-one lunch or dinner with Balaji.
Each member of the winning team will receive an Amazon Echo Dot plus a gift card!
Each team member will be awarded an Amazon Echo Dot
Dinner of choice with Balaji or Moin!

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is this project a new approach to and clever implementation of something beneficial to the IP Engineering team?
Does your solution solve a current business need?
Was a technically difficult problem solved? Is the solution well engineered for the chosen problem?
How thoroughly implemented is this project?
Is the solution usable in its current state? Is the user experience smooth? Does everything appear to work? Is it well designed?
